author: Staff Reporter
text:
The construction of flyover across Pazhayar river in Suchindram would be over by April, said the Union Minister of State for Road Transport, Highways and Shipping Pon Radhakrishnan here on Saturday. Inspecting the progress of the flyover, the Minister said that the Calcutta-Chennai Highway was extended up to Thoothukudi. Minister Nirmala Seetharaman assured to extend the highway up to the proposed Colechal commercial port, he said. “If the Colechal Commercial Port comes into existence, the economic status of the district will go up, though some vested interests are campaigning against the project,” Mr. Radhakrishnan said.

A mega alliance under the leadership of BJP would emerge soon for the assembly election, he added.
title: Flyover will be ready by April: Minister
